Class RandomWithStringsIO

java.lang.Object
  RandomWithStringsIO

public class RandomWithStringsIO
extends java.lang.Object

Writes to and reads from a RandomAccessFile with fixed-length String and int variables.

Version:
Copyright 2005 (c) SCCC West
Author:
Carl B. Struck

Constructor Summary
RandomWithStringsIO()
           
 
Method Summary
static void input()
          Reads student name, grade and credits data from a RandomAccessFile with fixed-length String and int variables, and prints the data to the terminal window.
static void output()
          Writes student name, grade and credits data to a RandomAccessFile with fixed-length String and int variables.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Reads student name, grade and credits data from a RandomAccessFile with fixed-length String and int variables, and prints the data to the terminal window.
